attributes.action: Take away peerages from Lords who have been imprisoned
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently a lord was sentenaced to 12 weeks in prison, In future all lords convicted of any offence which can result in a custodial sentence should lose their right to be called lord and their peerages should be taken away from them.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
